title: Chicken and mushroom roulade
ingredients: ['50g butter', '225g button mushrooms, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '120g seasoned breadcrumbs, divided', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, pounded thin', '2 tablespoons melted butter', '175ml double cream']
